price: 76. Mes nenuskriaudėme jų, tačiau jie buvo Zalimūn (daugiadieviai, bloga darantieji).
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
